duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead end-to-end and administration duties for critical banking platforms, delivering middleware infrastructure for enterprise projects and regulatory initiatives.
Ensure production stability, platform remediation, patching and upgrades, mitigating and managing risk.
Middleware installation, configuration, risk mitigation, and remediation, performance tuning, and troubleshooting/triage as L3 production support.
Experience with Middleware products such as Appian, Software AG WEB METHODS.
Experience with Java/Container Framework, Linux Operating System, and scripting languages like shell, python, jython, Perl.
Experience with Release Deploy Tools like Ansible, Ansible Tower, XLR, BitBucket, Celestial.
Prior Bank of America experience, DEVOPS experience, and other related products like BMC Remedy, Harmon mDeliver, BMC Bladelogic Server Automation.
Understanding of Network infrastructure (HTTP/S, TCP/IP, TLS,DNS, Load-balancers, firewalls, proxies, B2B links).
Excellent oral and written communication skills and strong attention to detail.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
